subraces.name: Lightfoot
subraces.description:
You can attempt to hide even when you are only obscured by a creature that is at least one size larger than you.

You gain Apprentice proficiency in the stealth skill.

subraces.name: Stout
subraces.description:
You have advantage on saving throws against poison, and you have resistance to poison damage.

Whenever you gain hit points at the end of a rest, you can gain additional hit points equal to your level.

generalPerks.name: Brave
generalPerks.description: You have advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

generalPerks.name: Nimble
generalPerks.description: You can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than yours.

generalPerks.name: Lucky
generalPerks.description: When you roll a 1 on an attack roll, Ability check, or saving throw, you can reroll the die. You must use the new result, even if it is a 1.

generalPerks.name: Halfling Charm
generalPerks.description: You have Apprentice proficiency with the Persuasion skill, and can give yourself advantage on a persuasion ability check with a member of a non-halfling race once per day.

generalPerks.name: Sticky Fingers
generalPerks.description: You have Trained proficiency in Thievery.

generalPerks.name: Sure Footed
generalPerks.description: You gain a climbing speed of 10 feet

generalPerks.name: Low-Light Vision
generalPerks.description: You can see in dim light as though it were by torchlight, but cannot see in darkness.
